name: Pet Hydrant: 2020
description:
I just don't see a reason why you shouldn't.

Features:

        ---Have your own fire hydrant.

        ---30 Different skins for you to collect.

        ---Make your own rythem with the beats.

        ---Anaerobic at the tip of your finger.

        ---Gatcha experience with no micro transaction and is totally safe for work.

Making a Gatcha game is actually more exhausting than I expected. 

Sound effects from:

https://freesound.org/people/Harrisando/sounds/466202/
